statements: SELECT * FROM thumbnails;
SELECT id, image_url, alt_text FROM thumbnails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM thumbnails WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, alt_text, variant_name FROM thumbnails WHERE variant_name = 'large';
SELECT id, image_url, click_through_rate FROM thumbnails WHERE click_through_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, image_url, alt_text, variant_name, click_through_rate FROM thumbnails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_url, alt_text FROM thumbnails WHERE variant_name = 'standard' AND click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM thumbnails WHERE click_through_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, image_url FROM thumbnails WHERE alt_text LIKE '%logo%';
SELECT variant_name, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM thumbnails GROUP BY variant_name HAVING AVG(click_through_rate) > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_ctr DESC;
SELECT * FROM video_thumbnails;
SELECT id, thumbnail_url FROM video_thumbnails WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT video_id, thumbnail_url FROM video_thumbnails ORDER BY thumbnail_url DESC;
SELECT id, is_active FROM video_thumbnails WHERE video_id = '26664e34-7e4c-4932-9fb6-62e5cd907647';
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 AND conversion_rate < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM video_thumbnails WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT id, thumbnail_url FROM video_thumbnails WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT thumbnail_url FROM video_thumbnails WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC, conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT test_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results GROUP BY test_id;
SELECT * FROM thumbnails;
SELECT thumbnail_url FROM thumbnails WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM thumbnails WHERE thumbnail_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT thumbnail_id, thumbnail_url, click_through_rate FROM thumbnails WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM video_thumbnails;
SELECT thumbnail_url, experiment_group FROM video_thumbnails WHERE experiment_group = 'A';
SELECT id, experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, group_assigned FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, thumbnail_clicked, click_timestamp FROM click_logs WHERE thumbnail_clicked LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, thumbnail_url FROM video_thumbnails WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, group_assigned, registration_date FROM users WHERE group_assigned = 'control' ORDER BY registration_date;
SELECT thumbnail_clicked, click_timestamp FROM click_logs WHERE click_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND click_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT video_title, thumbnail_url FROM Videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, start_date FROM Experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM Clicks WHERE click_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_id = 3;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM Groups JOIN Clicks ON Groups.group_id = Clicks.group_id GROUP BY group_name;

SELECT Users.username, Videos.video_title, Experiments.experiment_name FROM Users JOIN Clicks ON Users.user_id = Clicks.user_id JOIN Videos ON Videos.video_id = Clicks.video_id JOIN Experiments ON Experiments.experiment_id = Clicks.experiment_id;
